Most Illustrious Sir Juan Antonio de Silvera Cerro Largo, May 9, 1839

Respectable Sir

With the greatest pleasure I have received the valuable letter of Your Lordship Your Lordship Your Lordship Your Lordship

Without further purpose, I remain yours, Your Lordship Your Lordship
